mapper.select: SELECT SUM(sa_base) AS sa_base, c_code, u_id, Count(*) AS s_code FROM salary WHERE s_code IN ( SELECT s_code FROM schedule WHERE ( ( c_code, u_id ) IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c_code, u_id FROM history WHERE h_qdate IS NULL AND h_position != 'A' ) ) AND s_start >= ( Trunc(SYSDATE) - ( interval '8' day ) ) AND s_start < ( Trunc(SYSDATE) - ( interval '1' day ) ) ) GROUP BY c_code, u_id
